title: The Deception of Annika
description: After the death of her parents, Annika Jacobs leaves everyone and everything she knows in her rear view mirror. Moving to Jacksonville, Florida -- where no one knows Annika or that she hails from family of powerful witches -- seems like a good idea.  At first everything seems to fall into place. A new apartment, a steady job, and new friends....and a handsome witch named Jonas that Annika can't help but find herself falling for.  It doesn't take long, however, for the past to come creeping back into her life...  Who are the mysterious Master Vampire Roman and his Second, Falcon, that keep turning up at all the wrong places. And who will Annika turn to when trust is betrayed and deception turns into danger...
author: Salice Rodgers
